Estas personas a pesar de las dificultades económicas, han tenido que  luchar contra todo tipo de adversidades para sacar adelante a sus familias, y brindarle mejores oportunidades.
Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora de la asociación comunal  es Ángela y tiene por actividad económica una pulpería, es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, jugos, fósforos, tiste, queso, crema. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
The communal bank group "Lirios de los Valles" is composed of 12 members, all single mothers with 20 children between them. They are from the northern region of Leon. These women are all hardworking and very responsible, with a great desire to help their families get ahead and provide their children with more opportunities. 

Angela is the group coordinator. She has a small grocery store from which she sells basic goods in small quantities such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, juice, matches, cheese and cream. She works in her store for 12 hours a day. She will use this loan as working capital to stock her business with new groceries, and hopes to improve her income by doing so in the near future.

loans.use: to stock her business with groceries such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, juice, matches, cheese and cream.

loans.name: Mirtha Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Mirtha habita en una comarca cercana a la ciudad de Managua, es una mujer soltera que se dedica al comercio de ropa y cosméticos por catálogos, ella vende en su casa y también de manera ambulante, Mirtha está buscando la manera de salir adelante con este pequeño negocio del cual mantiene sus gastos principales del hogar y compra sus medicamentos. Solicita este crédito con el fin de invertir en productos para abastecerse y ofrecer variedades a su clientela, con el apoyo de financiamiento comprara cosméticos para damas y caballeros, pantalones, camisas y ropa interior, de esta manera espera incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Mirtha lives in a community close to the city of Managua. She is single and works selling clothing and cosmetics that she orders by catalog. She sells her goods from her house, and also door to door. Mirtha is looking for a way to grow this small business in order to cover her living expenses and buy the medicine that she needs. 

She plans to invest this loan in the purchase of goods to stock her business, so she can offer a greater variety of products to her clients. She plans to buy cosmetics, pants, shirts and under garments, and increase her income through improved sales.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, pants, shirts and under garments.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es:
Aracely tiene 33 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus bosques de algarrobo y clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Tiene una bodeguita donde ofrece golosinas, y productos de primera necesidad leche, azúcar, menestras, arroz, aceite, desde hace un año, es una mujer emprendedora, se esfuerza en la labor que realiza, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de gaseosas, y golosinas para incrementar su negocio y de esta manera ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Aracely, 33, lives with her parents in Morropon district, a community characterized by its carob tree forests and hot climate. Its people work in agriculture, trade and cattle raising. Two hours from the city of Piura, north coast of Peru.

She has had a small store  for more than a year where she offers snacks and basic needs like milk, sugar, lentils, rice, and oil. She is an enterprising woman; she pushes herself in the work that she carries out. 

She has applied for a loan of 500 nuevos soles for the purchase of soda and snacks to grow her business and in this manner, offer to her customers, generating additional income for her family.

loans.use: to buy soda and snacks to stock her business.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: El joven Miguel tiene 26 años y es Soltero,  estudia la carrera  Licenciatura en una universidad muy reconocida de la Ciudad de La Paz,  trabaja para pagar sus estudios El joven Miguel trabaja como empleado en una  Distribuidora de productos varios en  la Zona de Villa Fátima de la Ciudad de la Paz este es su primer crédito con la institución y Miguel va a usar este préstamo para  distintos gastos  que implica el estudiar cómo financiar los gastos escolares de matriculación, Materiales y/o útiles para terminar sus estudios que durara el tiempo 5 años. Miguel enfrenta retos en su estudios que son Su trabajo no le permite dedicarse al 100% a su estudio, pero el joven tiene ganas de continuar y seguir adelante. su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es Quiere terminar su profesión, mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Miguel is 26 years old, single, and studying at a very well-known university in the city of La Paz. He also works to pay for his studies, as an employee for a product distributor in the Villa Fátima region of La Paz. 

This is Miguel's first loan with this institution, which he will use for various school expenses such as matriculation fees and school supplies. He hopes to finish his stuides within a total of 5 years. Miguel has faced many challenges throughout his education, as his work does not allow him to dedicate 100% of his time to school, but he has great drive to continue and get ahead. His goal is to finish his studies and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: To finance school matriculation costs and the purchase of school materials.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael tiene 22 años de edad vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Colasay, una distrito que se caracteriza por sus bosques verdes, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, que pertenece a la provincia de Jaén, ubicado en la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica al cultivo de café desde hace diez años, Rafael nos comenta que su producción lo transporta hasta la provincia de donde pertenece para comercializarlo, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 501 nuevos soles para invertirlo en darle mantenimiento a su cultivo para prevenir la plaga de la roya y de esta manera tener una buena producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Rafael is 22 years old.  He lives with his wife in the district of Colasay, a district known for its green forests whose inhabitants work in farming, commerce, and livestock.  It belongs to Jaén Province, which is in the Cajamarca Region in the northern mountain range of Peru.  

He has been growing coffee for ten years.  Rafael tells us that he transports his produce from where he is to the province to sell it.  He has requested a loan of 2,501 nuevos soles to invest in maintaining his crops to prevent rust, which will allow him to have good produce to offer his customers and generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to maintain his crops by buying fertilizers

loans.name: Nilser

texts.es:
Nilser tiene 41 años de edad vive junto a su esposa en el caserío de Queromarca una zona rural de Callayuc, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, papa, yuca, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Cutervo, ubicado en la región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno, cuenta con clientela considerable, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de una ternero para posteriormente venderlo a un mejor precio, lo que le generara mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Nilser is 41 and lives with his wife in the village of Queromarca, a rural zone of Callayuc. Its population works growing sugar cane, potatoes, cassava, trading, and raising cattle. Two hours from the city of Cutervo, located in the Cajamarca region, northern sierra of Peru.

He makes his living raising and selling cattle. He has a considerable clientele. He has applied for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles for the purchase of a calf to sell it later at a better price; this will generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a calf.

loans.name: Liz Shirley

texts.es:
Liz Shirley tiene 37 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella tiene una pequeña bodega donde vende productos de primera necesidad leche, azúcar, menestras, enlatados, entre otros, son una familia unida su esposo ofrece servicios de mano de construcción.

Liz ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 4 500 nuevos soles para la compra de una máquina compactadora para el trabajo de construcción y de esta manera su esposo poder ofrecer otro servicio y así generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Liz Shirley is 37 years old and lives with her husband and children in the district of Cayalti. The members of this community are dedicated primarily to agriculture, commerce, and livestock. Cayalti is located two hours from the city of Chiclayo along the northern coast of Peru. 

Liz Shirley has a small store from which she sells basic groceries such as milk, sugar, and canned goods among other things. Her husband offers construction services, and they are a very close-knit family. 

Liz is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 4,500 Soles loan, which she will use to buy a compactor machine for construction work. This way her husband will be able to offer his clients better service, and improve their family's income.

loans.use: to buy a compactor machine for construction

loans.name: Bacilia

texts.es:
Bacilia tiene 45 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Buenos Aires, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus bosques de algarrobo, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica al comercio de frutas mangos, plátanos y naranjas su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, en ocasiones traslada sus productos hasta la ciudad de Piura, su esposo alquila una moto bomba de agua, son una familia emprendedora, Bacilia ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para darle mantenimiento a sus cultivos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia
texts.en:
Bacilia is 45 years old.  She lives with her husband in the district of Buenos Aires, whose inhabitants work in farming, commerce, and livestock.  It is a community known for its carob forests that is two hours from the city of Piura on Peru's northern coast. 

She sells fruits: mangoes, bananas, and oranges.  Her business is located in her home.  Sometimes she transports her produce to the city of Piura.  Her husband rents a water pump.  They are an enterprising family.  Bacilia is requesting a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to maintain her crops so she can generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to maintain her crops by buying fertilizers

loans.name: Joanne

texts.en:
Joanne works hard to support her family. Joanne is married and has a rice and corn mill operator business in the Philippines.

Joanne requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to pay the salaries of rice and corn mill operators.  Joanne has been in this business for 18 years now.

In the future, Joanne would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to pay for the salaries of rice and corn mill operators.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Catalina works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from direct selling ready to wear and Avon products. Catalina is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase more ingredients like peanuts, flour, candies, etc. for her business.

Catalina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients like peanuts, flour, candies, etc. for her business

loans.name: Garegin

texts.en: Garegin is 58 years old and he lives in the village Pambak, which is in Lori region. He is married and has a son and a daughter. Both of them are married and live with their families. Garegin lives with his parents, who are already retired.  His father is a long-lived person; he is 100 years old. Thanks to his father, Garegin has become a very famous beekeeper in his village.  His father used to be the best beekeeper in their village, and for years he taught his son all his skills and the secrets of beekeeping, and still now despite his age, he helps him greatly. He always says to his son that bees are very powerful and enigmatic insects in nature, and man must work with them carefully, accurately and of course with love. As Garegin says, it is just obvious that in the whole region, he can surely say that there is no honey better than his.  Garegin wants to increase the number of his beehives and he asks a loan of 1,000,000 AMD in order to buy 25 beehives and continue his father’s work.

loans.use: to buy 25 beehives and continue his father’s work,developing his beekeeping business.

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Annie works hard to support her family.

She has a selling ready-to-wear clothing business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending. Annie is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of clothing like blouses, pants, bags and other items.

Annie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing like blouses, pants, and bags to sell

loans.name: Ayat

texts.en: Ayat is 19 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Salt with her four siblings and her parents. Ayat is studying in her second year for her Bachelor's of Business Administration. She is planning to continue her studies to find a job in her study field after graduation to start earning a better income and help her family financially. But she doesn't currently have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Makonda Group

texts.en:
Makonda is a Nuru International group of four farmers in Kuria West District in Kenya. The members joined the group to acquire skills and knowledge on improved farming methods. They are able to obtain loans through Nuru to acquire farm inputs. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan.

Daniel, pictured with his hand raised, is a representative of the Makonda Group of Nuru Farmers. Daniel is 28 years old and married with two children, one of whom attends school. Daniel has been farming with Nuru for two years. The loan from Kiva in this coming season will enable him to obtain farm inputs, which he believes will increase his farm yields. Daniel, just like other members of his group, will take input loans for one acre. He will grow maize on 1/2 acre, sorghum and millet on ¼ acre each. He will obtain food for his household as well as sell the surplus and invest in another business. Later he will build a house for his family.

loans.use: To purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum and millet

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is 21 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Zarqaa with her five siblings and her parents. Both of her parents are retired. Rana is in her second year of studies at the university where she hopes to earn a bachelors degree in teaching. She is planning to continue her studies and then find a job in her field after graduation. Rana hopes to earn a better income to help her family financially. 

Rana is requesting a loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees as she doesn't currently have enough money.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Shadi

texts.en:
Shadi is 21 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbed with his three siblings and his parents. His father is a retired man. Shadi is in his first year of studies at the university where he hopes to earn a bachelors degree in accounting. He is planning to continue his studies and then find a job in his field of study after graduation. Shadi hopes to start earning a better income to help his family financially. 

Shadi is requesting a loan to pay for his upcoming semester fees as he doesn't currently have enough money.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Mturio Nyakorogati Group

texts.en:
Mturio Nyakoragati is a Nuru International group of three farmers in Kuria West district in Kenya. The members joined the group to acquire skills and knowledge on improved farming methods. They are able to obtain loans through Nuru to acquire farm inputs. As a group the members collectively guarantee the loan.

Daniel, who is a representative of the Mturio Nyakoragati Group of Nuru farmers, has been farming with Nuru for three years. He has been able to learn better farming methods and hence gain higher yields in terms of the harvest. With the loan from Kiva, he hopes to obtain farm inputs, which will enable him implement the better farming methods he has been able to learn. He hopes to harvest enough to sustain his family’s food security and sell the surplus to get money to pay for his three children who go to school.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum, and millet

loans.name: Nehad

texts.en:
Nehad is 24 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with her six siblings and her parents. Nehad is in her fourth year of studies at the university where she hopes to earn a bachelors degree in sport training. She is planning to continue her studies and then find a job in her field of study after graduation. Nehad hopes to start earning a better income to help her family financially.

Nehad is requesting a loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees as she doesn't currently have enough money.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Ushirikiano Group

texts.en:
Ushirikiano is a Nuru International group comprised of two farmers in Kuria, West District in Kenya. The members formed the group to acquire skills and knowledge about improved farming methods. They are able to obtain loans through Nuru to acquire farm inputs. As a group, the members collectively guarantee their loan.

Cathrine is a member of the Ushirikiano group. She is 29 years old and married with four children, three of whom attend school. She is requesting a loan from Kiva to purchase purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum and millet. Cathrine hopes to practice better farming methods that lead to high yields. She plans to sell her surplus harvest and invest her money in a business that she believes will improve her living standards and those of her family.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum and millet

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es: consuelo de 41 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere hacer una mejora en su vivienda pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de materiales como cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra para poder construir un muro atrás de su casa y poder instalar la luz en la cocina para que ella y sus hijos puedan vivir cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Consuelo is 41 years old. She is a single mother who lives in her own home with her four children. Consuelo has had a small store in her home for various years. With the earnings she obtains from the store she can pay for some of the expenses of her home. She wants to improve her home, but with what she is earning she can't accomplish this goal. This is the reason she is seeking a loan to purchase materials like cement, sand, bricks, iron and payment for manual labor to construct a wall next to her home and to install lights in the kitchen so that she and her children can live comfortably and securely.

loans.use: to purchase materials like cement, sand, bricks and iron, and to pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a junior high school graduate. She sells jollofrice which is served with vegetables, fish and meat. She sells to individuals around her locality called Takoradi. She has been involved in this business for two years. Grace is divorced but has two children. The income from her business normally goes towards helping her to pay her children’s school fees. She has noticed that there is a growing demand among customers for her food. Nevertheless, she is unable to meet their needs due to limited working capital. Thus, she aims to use her loan to purchase more rice, fish and other ingredients for the preparation of the food. With the new profits from her expanded business, Grace wants to buck the trend by ensuring that all her children will be given the opportunity to have an education, as well as securing a better location for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, fish and other ingredients for the preparation of food.

loans.name: Sorphon

texts.en: Sorphon is 29 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been working as a chef for more than three years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband is employed in a fish farm. He earns about USD 5 daily. Due to lack of funds, Sorphon is requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase a plot of land. This money will help her obtain a better place for her family to live. In the future, she would like to run her own fish farm and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she will build her house in the next two years.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land

loans.name: Ikrom

texts.ru:
Икром житель Руми. Ему 33 года. Он счастливый отец пятерых детей. У него есть 4 сына и дочка. Икром с женой рано поженились и поэтому старшему сыну Икрома 15 лет. Младшего сына зовут Умедчон ему 2 года. Икром очень сильно любит свою семью и старается всегда ради их благо. Икром как глава семейства должен своей жене и детям предоставить еду, образование и здравоохранение. Он старается всеми силами. 
  Икром работает в паспортном столе района Дж.Руми. Но дополнительно хочет начать новый бизнес по животноводству. Для обоснования бизнеса ему не хватает $3000, для такого бизнеса такая сумма является не большой. Потому что многие животные стоят очень дорого, и не каждый сможет начать и развивать бизнес в этой сфере деятельности. Икром понимает, что ему будет нелегко, но он не боится трудностей и следует вперед.
texts.en:
Ikrom is a 33-year-old resident of the J.Rumy region of Tajikistan.  He's the happy father of 5 children (4 sons and a daughter); he and his wife married young, so their oldest son is already 15, while their youngest son, Umedchon, is 2.  Ikrom loves his family more than anything and tries his best to provide for them.  As the breadwinner in the family, he is obligated to provide his wife and children with food, education, and medical treatment.

Ikrom is currently working in a passport office in J.Rumy, but would like to start raising livestock to earn some extra money on the side.  He feels he needs to borrow $3000 in addition to what he's already saved in order to get started, which is really not a whole lot of money when you consider how much it costs to buy livestock.  Ikrom understands that it won't be easy to be a successful livestock farmer, but remains undaunted by potential hardships, and will move forward with his plans, come what may.

loans.use: buy bull calves and set up a new livestock-raising business.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo tiene 38 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de La Matanza, una comunidad tranquila que se caracteriza por sus bosques de algarrobos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de ganado vacuno y caprino desde hace cinco año, cuenta con clientela fija en la zona, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de ovejas y una segunda parte para la compra de alimentos balanceados, lo que le permitirá tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Eduardo, 38, lives with his wife in La Matanza district, a tranquil community that is characterized by its carob tree forests. Its population works in agriculture, trade and cattle raising. Two hours from the city of Piura, northern coast of Peru.

He has been making his living selling cattle and goats for the last five years. He has a fixed clientele in the area. He has applied for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles for the purchase of sheep and a second part for the purchase of balanced feed. This will let him have better production to offer to his clients and, in this manner, generate better income for his family.

loans.use: purchase balanced feed and buy sheep.

loans.name: Arshak

texts.en:
Arshak lives in the village of Sarigyugh that is in the Tavush region. He has a large family, and he lives with his wife, parents, and his son’s family. 

He has a rich farm and thanks to farming and agriculture, he provides his family with good living conditions. On his farm he has nine cows, one bull, eight heifers, three piglets and twenty-five chickens. As a skilled farmer, Arshak manages to sell his farm products (dairy-products, meat, milk and eggs) both at the local wholesale market and through re-sellers. 

Arshak greatly hopes to have a decent income through the help of this loan, since his first two loans from Kiva were very productive for him.

He is asking for a loan of 1,100,000 Armenian drams (AMD) in order to buy a cow, several piglets, and a lot of animal fodder for the winter months.

loans.use: to buy a cow, several piglets and a lot of animal fodder for the winter months

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 48 years old and married with three children.

Fe works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like snack foods, chocolates, biscuits, soft drinks, canned goods and other groceries to sell in her general store.

Fe has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and earns additional income from raising livestock.

Fe aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en:
Lanie is 52 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Lanie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Lanie has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, and other groceries to sell. 

In the future Lanie would like to save enough to build a restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Felna

texts.en:
Felna is 35 years old and married with six children, three of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them. For the past eight years, Felna has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells such items as canned goods, shampoo, hair conditioner, detergent, soap, soft-drinks, and other products. 

Felna is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Reham

texts.en: Reham is 22 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Zarqa with her three siblings and her parents. Reham is studying in her 1st year for her Bachelor's of English Literature. She is planning to continue her studies to find a job in her study field after graduation to start earning a better income to help her family financially. But she doesn't currently have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Reham

texts.en:
Reham is 25 years old. She is widowed and lives alone in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Irbid. Reham is in her second year of studying for her master’s degree in business administration. She hopes to find a better job in her field after graduation. 

Reham is requesting a loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees, as she currently doesn’t have enough money. In the future, she hopes to support herself financially.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Sreyoun's Group

texts.en:
Sreyoun is a 26-year-old mother of two children and a resident of a rural village in the Ponhea Krek district. The family's main source of income comes from rice farming and cassava planting. The current business earns her about 38,000 KHR per day to meet the needs of the family. 
This is the first loan for Sreyoun’s group of two members, both of whom are female. She is now leading her group to apply for a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her income so as to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Asel

texts.en:
Asel is a freshman in the International and Business Law Program. This is her story:

My ambition in the future is to become a big and successful person. To do that, the most important thing is where you study. AUCA is the only English language university in Kyrgyzstan with qualified faculty, providing big possibilities to go abroad and to have new foreign friends.

During my time in secondary school, I experienced many obstacles, starting with the English language and finishing with public speaking. To overcome these obstacles, I got help from my teachers, some of whom teach at AUCA, and support from my classmates. I am purposeful, sociable, active, able to find a common language and common themes, ready for new discoveries, and I love learning about languages and foreign cultures. 

I want to become a lawyer or a legal scholar. Higher education is a step to a better future, but for this, you need a good foundation. I want to go to AUCA because it offers the best opportunities, is affordable and is close to home. When I will study at American University of Central Asia, I'll be near to my mom, who is the most important person in my life, and the only one who always supports me and helps me unconditionally. I am lucky to have such a mother and I want to make her proud.

loans.use: to pay for her higher education

loans.name: Tasleem

texts.en:
Tasleem is a 59-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of two daughters and four sons. 

She requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her son. Her son is a tailor and very expert in his profession. He has been sewing clothes for many years, which is the reason he has gotten a lot experience in his profession. His sewing machine is out of order and needs to be replaced with a new one but he does not have sufficient money to buy a new machine.

Therefore, Tasleem requested a loan for her son so that he can buy a new sewing machine. Her family members have to do hard work to earn an income for their huge family. Her younger son also provides some monthly income. Tasleem wants to arrange a dowry for the marriage of her daughter, which is why she is saving most of their earnings.
 
Tasleem is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for her son's business.

loans.name: Al-Nada Group

texts.en:
Asila is a housewife with three children. Her husband works in a furniture store and earns a low salary that is not enough to cover her needs. Asila decided to assist her husband and improve their home. She is a member of a loan group called Al-Nada, which consists of four women who have requested a loan from AMB. 

Asila will use her portion of Al-Nada’s 200,000 YER loan to help her cover the costs of purchasing new furniture to use for her house. This will enhance home and give her family a good life. In the future, Asila hopes to enroll her children into private schools. The child who appears in this photo is the son of one of the group members.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture to use for her house

loans.name: Shamem's Group

texts.en:
Shamem is a vigorous 45-year-old lady who is the mother of three children. She has been stitching clothes for many years. Shamem stitches clothes for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to a lack of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. Shamem is in her fifth loan cycle with a good credit history.

Shamem is requesting a loan from the Kiva field partner BRAC Pakistan to buy more spools of thread in different colors, along with the packs of laces, zippers, and buttons. Her loan will allow her to stitch up more dresses on time and to generate a healthier income.

loans.use: to buy spools of threads in different colors, packs of laces, zippers, and buttons

loans.name: Ajdar

texts.en:
Ajdar is a 33-year-old master stonemason. He has been in this business for seven years. Ajdar is married and has two children. His six-year-old son goes to first class, and his four-year-old daughter goes to kindergarden. His family lives in Pirallahi village of the Baku region.

Ajdar has applied for a loan in the amount of 2,100 AZN to buy new materials which are useful in his business.

He thankful to Komak and Kiva for their help. In the future, he wants to recruit an assistant and provide a good education for his children.

loans.use: to buy new materials

loans.name: Tul

texts.en:
Tul is 35 years old and is married with four children. She lives with her family in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. For the past five years, Tul has been raising and selling beef and she earns approximately 4 USD daily. Her husband is a driver who makes an income of 2 USD each day. Three of her children are employed in garment factories and earn 10 USD daily. 

Tul is requesting a 1,500 USD loan to purchase cattle to resell. She will use her loan to generate more income for the family. In the future, Tul would like to expand her business and help her children earn a higher education. Moreover, she plans to build a new house within the next two years.

loans.use: to purchsae cattle to resell

loans.name: Gavhar

texts.ru:
Это Гавхар. Она юная швея в возрасте 22 лет. Гавхар живет с матерью, отцом, двумя братьями и младшей сестрой в городе Душанбе - столице Таджикистана. Гавхар начала свое швейное дело в начале 2010 года и уже более 3 лет как она занимается этим делом. Она шьёт женские национальные одежды и принимают заказы у себя дома. Ей в деле помогает мать. Гавхар еще не замужем. Она одновременно учится в заочном отделении Аграрного Университета и сама платит за учебу за счет своей швейной деятельности. 
Сейчас Гавхар хочет расширить свою деятельность. Она просит кредит для приобретения модернизированной компьютерной швейной машинки и тканей для шитья. С помощью этой швейной машинки она собирается теперь делать на платьях красивые вышивки. Естественно услуга за шитьё таких платьев будет стоить дороже и таким образом Гавхар хочет увеличить получаемый доход. В будущем она планирует открыть собственный швейный цех.
texts.en:
This is Gavhar, a young 22-year-old seamstress from Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan.  Gavhar lives there with her parents, two brothers and younger sister, and has yet to be married.  She first started working as a seamstress at the start of 2010, and, as such, has been at it for more than 3 years.  She works out of her home together with her mother, and specializes in Tajikistani folk apparel for women.  In addition to making women's clothes, she is also studying as a distance-learning student at a university specializing in agriculture, and is paying for her tuition out of pocket.  

Gavhar feels the time is right to start expanding her business.  She is requesting a loan to buy a modern computerized sewing machine, as well as some additional fabrics for sewing.  With the help of this new sewing machine, she'll be able to make more intricate patterns on her dresses.  Naturally, such dresses will command a higher price and allow her to earn more money, bringing her one step closer to realizing her future plans of opening her own sewing shop.

loans.use: buy a computerized sewing machine and various fabrics for sewing.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda, 55 years of age, is widowed and has three children. She owns and operates a retail business selling seasonings and ingredients for cooking daily meals. She's been in this business for almost four years and earns a net income of PHP 500 per day. Usually her profits are spent on their electric bills, food expenses, and payments for her loan at the public market. But, due to the lack of capital, she would like a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase cooking oil, fish sauce, onions, garlic, and soy sauce to sell. She's hoping that through the loan that she requested, her business will continue to grow and earn more profits.

loans.use: To purchase cooking oil, fish sauce, onions, garlic, and soy sauce to sell.
